de.dhbw.stress_yourself

Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.stress_yourself.Admin

  • public class Admin
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Admin creates a JPanel with configuration components on it - User management: - create / delete user - change password - Test management: - activate / deactivate modules - change given time for modules - change module order - change difficulty of the test
    Author:
    Florian Albert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Admin.SetMaxText
      Class SetMaxText - with this class you are able to set the maxlength of an JTextField / JPasswordField in a very easy way. - use: someTextField.setDocument(new SetMaxText(int Max));
